dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2908 IH: Middle Class Savings Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to apply current income tax bracket breakpoints to capital gains brackets.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Middle Class Savings Act.

section.header: Application of current income tax bracket breakpoints to capital gains brackets

subsection.text: Section 1(j)(5)(B) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking $77,200 in clause (i)(I) and inserting $103,350,
by striking $51,700 in clause (i)(II) and inserting $69,200,
by striking $479,000 in clause (ii)(I) and inserting $626,350,
by striking $452,400 in clause (ii)(II) and inserting $591,600, and
by striking $425,800 in clause (ii)(III) and inserting $591,600.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this Act shall apply with respect to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
